inclusion.criterion: pre-operative area prior to the planned procedure (ERCP)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: past medical history reviewed with patient and special attention placed on particular co-morbid conditions
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: transthoracic echocardiogram (TTE) performed concurrently during ERCP
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: serial images taken every ten to fifteen minutes throughout ERCP and more often as needed
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: TTE findings entered into study database within a separate research chart
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient returned to supine position and taken to recovery room after ERCP if no significant findings on TTE
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: written record of TTE entered into study database within a separate research chart
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: TTE findings communicated to endoscopist and anesthesia provider if significant enough to require change in patient's medical care
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: clinically insignificant emboli not reported in patient's medical record
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: evaluation of myocardium using transthoracic echocardiography includes evaluation of left ventricle, right ventricle and pulmonary artery pressures
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: parameters measured to assist in determination of problem include right ventricular function, left ventricular function, pulmonary artery systolic pressure, presence of new right-to-left intracardiac shunt or bowing of intraatrial septum
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: subject positioning for ERCP is prone
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: subject intolerance of pressure of TTE probe
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: subject body habitus interferes with obtaining adequate images to assess for intra-cardiac air
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of hypertension, hyperlipidemia and hypothyroidism. He smokes cigarette 1 pack per day for 40 years and alcohol consumption of 5 to 6 beers per week.
